title: Patalliro! Stardust Keikaku
synopsis: A series of diamond robberies have taken place all over the world. When Malynera's reserves are also emptied, Patalliro and Bancoran head to Japan following a clue in the form of a mechanical spider found on the scene.
characters: ['Juschenfe, Maraich', 'Bancoran, Major Jack Barbarossa', 'Patalliro the 8th', 'Bjorn', 'Plasma X', 'Kanja Neko', 'Sanders, Iyomante', 'Shugerg', 'Andresen', 'Patalliro the 7th']
voices: ['Fujita, Toshiko', 'Sogabe, Kazuyuki', 'Shiraishi, Fuyumi', 'Toda, Keiko', 'Hori, Hideyuki', 'Ootake, Hiroshi', 'Takiguchi, Junpei', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Tajima, Reiko', 'Sugiyama, Kazuko']
